wikipedia_page.main: Greg Day (born 1957) is a playwright who created several radio and stage plays between 1983 and the present day. His 1983 play The Arrangement was described as "the most disturbing bedsitcom since Polanski's The Tenant" by Time Out magazine.

response: Greg Day (born February 25, 1977) is a Canadian professional ice hockey forward currently playing for the Graz 99ers of the Austrian Hockey League (EBEL).
